# Request for Proposal: Kitchen Equipment Maintenance and Repair Services
---------------------------------------------------------------
### Solicitation Number: WS4413570016
### Amendment Number: 4
### Publication Date: March 21, 2024
### Tender Closing Date: April 15, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

### Solicitation Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, invites offerors to submit proposals for the provision of kitchen equipment maintenance and repair services to Real Properties Operations Detachment Borden, Ontario.

### Requirements

*   The offeror must be able to provide service, maintenance, and repairs of kitchen equipment as required by the Department of National Defence.
*   A portion of the services must be provided on an “as and when requested” basis during the period of the contract via TA Form 626.

### Services

The following UNSPSC codes relate to this solicitation:

*   *72102900 – Facility maintenance and repair services*
*   *72151800 – Machine installation and maintenance and repair services*
*   *73152100 – Manufacturing equipment maintenance and repair services*

### Basis of Selection

The successful offeror will be determined by the lowest price.

### Terms of Contract

The expected contract start date is July 1, 2024. There is no expected contract end date.

### Notice and Contact Information

*   See the attached notice for further information.
*   Contact Allison Fernandez at allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any questions or clarification.

### Solicitation Documents

All solicitation documents are available on the Ariba Discovery platform. [[1]](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19175384?extsite=MTkxNzUzODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit is required for all offerors.

### Language Requirements

English and French are the official languages of the Government of Canada.

You are solely responsible for ensuring your bid is submitted on time and meets all requirements stated in the solicitation document. [[2]](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19175384?extsite=MTkxNzUzODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
